data.title: average at best
data.text: Its a slider joint. My main problem were the health issues. The guy cooking uses his bare hands, potatoes, bread, etc. The cashier/waitress is even better, picks up dirty dishes, makes change, then sticks her bare hands into pickles and onions. sitting at the counter here can be a real experience.

data.title: Not so good
data.text: I went there two times,both were not good. Once for breakfast,once for a burger. Both times they had their bacon and sausages precooked and piled high, yuck. I could go on about it more but let's just say they don't care how long things sit out. The burgers were pretty gross, and lacked any uniqueness.If you want a good slider go to Tellway on John R in Madison Heights. If you like Pokemon Go Bray's has a stop their.

data.title: Typical Diner
data.text: I really enjoy their burgers late at night... The old style cooked on the grill with carmelized onions... Just a little on the greasy side the way I like it... If you've been out partying all night and looking for something to eat this is better than the White Castles... Wouldn't recommend it for breakfast. Their prices are really good , but the breakfast is not all that good... Their grill is too hot, my eggs are always overcooked, toast seem to be burned... They make these potato cakes comma I wouldn't feed them to my dog LOL...... But like I said they're really good old-time greasy burgers

data.title: Slider heaven
data.text: Greasy sliders are delicious.  I get 4 cheeseburgers at a time. I am depressed when they are gone. I can easily eat 8 of them but i would loose my sea cow like body. Stop in and enjoy.

data.title: Best burgers!
data.text: Very cute old fashioned, hamburger joint.  They make their potato chips from scratch.  Cheap prices, great food!

data.title: Enjoy a piece of memory lane NOW
data.text: Bray's has been a family tradition my entire life (and I'm no youngster ;-)  Step back in time when burgers were made fresh, fries were crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside and shakes really have taste!  Visit this great little burger joint.

data.title: Grandpas Favorite
data.text: I had been before maybe 35 years ago. Taste was same! Really good burger and Fries place!! Great wait staff crazy how fast the food was! Grilled onions and Brays sauce!!

data.title: Love me some Bray's
data.text: Every city has that one burger place where the sliders are served hot and juicy. The fries are crispy. The sodas seem more fizzy. Thats Brays.  I love this place!

data.title: Great slider joint
data.text: If you ever want to try an original slider. This is the place near Westland.  They Are good if you like the sliders. I'd recommend it to anyone

data.title: Great "old fashioned" burger joint
data.text:
Simple burger joint  in a retro setting.  Simple and yet elegant...sour pickle chips, grilled onions, a splash of mustard and katsup.....yummmm...combo meal comes with fries...
I've been here as early as 7AM to bring Bray Burgers to friends from out of town.  
Even then people are waiting for great breakfast sandwiches or burgers and fries to go. 
Kiss the cook.

data.title: If you love grilled onions.....yes
data.text: I stop by Brays for a burger before I go grocery shopping, that way I'm not hungry and it keeps me from buying a lot of junk food. Not that I would say that Brays burgers are healthy by any means, but the trade off is well worth it. I always get my burger to go. The person on the drive thru speaker is usually quick to take my order. When I get my burger it is always as I ordered it, hot, but a little greasy. Even tho it is greasy, the bun is not soggy. They nicely provide 2 or 3 napkins so that I don't make a mess. It is great if you carry wipes in your car to remove the onion smell from your hands (or since I am on my way to shop I just use a wipe at the store to wipe the basket handle and my hands).

data.title: Good food unfriendly waitress
data.text: Got my food to go was standing in wrong spot to order waitress with blue hair let me know in a very rude manner girl at takeout counter was just the opposite  very friendly fast and efficient.   Kudos to her.  I believe her name was Theresa.  Girl with blue hair you need to learn how to talk to people you were  hardly busy with only  three tables occupied and acted so rude and when i asked you a question  you said i got tables to wait on.  I tried to tell you we wanted to sit at  counter and have a pop.while we waited for our food and you said we. COULDNT.  IT WAS A FORTY DOLLAR ORDER.  YOU NEED TO ADDRESS PEOPLE IN A FRIENDLIER MANNER.  THERE WASNT ANY CUSTOMERS AT THE COUNTER SO I DONT THINK IT WAS TOO MUCH TO ASK.

data.title: cool place good burgers
data.text: This place serves good burgers. The burger is the size I like, the service is really good. It's kind of old style seating and decoration.

data.title: For Me It's More Nostalgia
data.text: I've been going to Bray's for years.  I remember back in the 50's when my Dad and Mom took 6 of us here and my Dad always bought the 12 burgers for a $1.00.    Sometimes he would surprise us with a milkshake as well.  Of course, the burgers are over $1.00 today.  The burger is fried on a grill and still has the fried up onions, mustard, ketchup and pickles.  It is still so, so good and brings back a lot of memories as well.

data.title: Throw Back
data.text: Here is a throwback diner.  It has the best chocolate milk shakes!  Love the burgers and fries.  I love that you have to wait for them to cook your hamburger, they are not cooked a head of time.  Great prices and friendly staff.

data.title: A traditional "Slider" burger!
data.text: Greatest little secret in Westland, great burgers, fries and breakfasts! Waitresses are friendly and efficent. Really great burgers, lots of onions!

data.title: ok.. not as good as has been in past
data.text: must have changed owners, wasn't as good as it has been over the past few years... :/ burgers is what they are known for. and they were not very good. same with their fries.

data.title: cheeburger, cheeburger, cheeburger
data.text: cheeseburger with extra onions mmmmm good shakes too.

data.title: A Decent Burger Place
data.text: It has a good reputation but I and my son thought is was just a decent burger place, no better or worse than many others.

data.title: Best sliders ever.....
data.text: I have been going here for over 40 years...Great burgers, fries, chile, service...and you cant beat the price...They now serve breakfast which is great also.......
